name: reactions_on_pull_requests
description: Tracks the number of reactions on pull requests, including specific pull request numbers like PR 67.

dimensions.name: pr_number
dimensions.description: The unique number identifying a pull request.

dimensions.name: reaction_content
dimensions.description: The type of reaction given to a pull request, such as thumbs up, thumbs down, etc.

measures.name: total_reactions
measures.description: The total count of reactions on a pull request.

sample_questions: How many reactions did PR 67 get?
What are the total reactions on pull requests?
Can you list the types of reactions on pull requests?
sql_to_underlying_datasource: SELECT pull_requests.number AS pr_number, pull_requests__reactions.content AS reaction_content, COUNT(pull_requests__reactions._dlt_id) AS total_reactions FROM pull_requests.pull_requests LEFT JOIN pull_requests.pull_requests__reactions ON pull_requests._dlt_id = pull_requests__reactions._dlt_parent_id GROUP BY pull_requests.number, pull_requests__reactions.content
